alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otero and north central El Paso Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 637 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of McGregor Range Base, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orogrande and McGregor Range Base. This includes Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 5 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central El Paso County; Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains
